question: Where is Tom De Boom based?
answer: With Master's degree from Université libre de Bruxelles, Certificat d'études secondaires supérieures from Athénée Fernand Blum, Tom De Boom has of experience as a Chargé de mission at Fédération Sportive Wallonie-Bruxelles Enseignement in, of experience as a Assistant chargé d'exercices at Université libre de Bruxelles in Région de Bruxelles, Belgique, of experience as a Professeur d'éducation physique at Wallonie Bruxelles Enseignement (WBE) in, of experience as a Préparateur physique at jeunes Sapeurs-Pompiers de Bruxelles in Région de Bruxelles, Belgique, of experience as a Sports Teacher at Fédération Wallonie-Bruxelles in Schaerbeek, of experience as a Head coach at Royal Linthout Basket Club in, of experience as a Teaching Assistant at Université libre de Bruxelles in, of experience as a Sports Instructor at Adeps in, of experience as a Sports Instructor at ULB Sports in and is proficient in Enseignement, Physical Education, Rehabilitation, Sports Nutrition, Athletic Training, Events Organisation, Sport, Gestion d'évènement, Recherche, Microsoft Office, PowerPoint, Teamwork, Team Management, Coaching, Parler en public, Anglais.
